Example1: sa kho so, bhikkhave, bālo abyatto akusalo sūdo sakassa bhattu nimittaṃ na uggaṇhāti, idaṃ vā me ajja bhattu sūpeyyaṃ ruccati, imassa vā abhiharati, imassa vā bahuṃ gaṇhāti, imassa vā vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati.

Meaning IN CONTEXT: from today onwards; lit. today first
Example1: ajja't'agge te, āvuso, samaṇ'uddesa na c'eva so bhagavā satthā apadisitabbo, yam'pi c'aññe samaṇ'uddesā labhanti bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ dirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ, s'āpi te n'atthi, cara'pi re, vinassā'ti.
Feedback: Spot a mistake? Fix it here.

Example1: atha kho tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ etad'ahosi, atippago kho tāva sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya carituṃ, yaṃ nūna mayaṃ yena aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ ārāmo ten'upasaṅkameyyāmā'ti
Feedback: Spot a mistake? Fix it here.

Example1: tena vattabbo, passasī'ti. āma passāmī'ti. āyatiṃ saṃvareyyāsī'ti
Feedback: Spot a mistake? Fix it here.

Example1: idāni, bhante, deve vassante deve gaḷagaḷāyante vijjullatāsu niccharantīsu asaniyā phalantiyā dve kassakā bhātaro hatā cattāro ca balibaddā
Feedback: Spot a mistake? Fix it here.

Meaning IN CONTEXT: one day; sometimes; at some (unspecified) time; lit. one time
Example1: ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu, ko paccayo yen'ekadā dīgharattaṃ sajjhāyakatā'pi mantā nappaṭibhanti, pag'eva asajjhāyakatā?

Meaning IN CONTEXT: at once; immediately; suddenly; lit. one time
Example1:
ucc'āvacehi vaṇṇehi,
urago carati tejasī,
so āsajja ḍaṃse bālaṃ,
naraṃ nāriñ'ca ekadā,
tasmā taṃ parivajjeyya,
rakkhaṃ jīvitam'attano.

Example1:
kadā nu'haṃ pabbatakandarāsu,
ekākiyo addutiyo vihassaṃ,
aniccato sabbabhavaṃ vipassaṃ,
taṃ me idaṃ taṃ nu kadā bhavissati.

Example1:
āyu usmā ca viññāṇaṃ,
yadā kāyaṃ jahant'imaṃ,
apaviddho tadā seti,
parabhattaṃ acetanaṃ.

Example1: atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi, handa dāni, bhikkhave, āmantayāmi vo, vayadhammā saṅkhārā appamādena sampādethā'ti. ayaṃ tathāgatassa pacchimā vācā.

Example1: mā pacchā vippaṭisārino ahuvattha

Example1:

yathā pacchā tathā pure,
yathā adho tathā uddhaṃ,
yathā uddhaṃ tathā adho.

Example1: brāhmaṇā, bhante, pacchābhūmakā kamaṇḍalukā sevālamālikā aggiparicārikā udak'orohakā soceyyāni paññapenti, tes'āhaṃ soceyyāni rocemī'ti

Example1: puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, idh'ekacco assakhaḷuṅko, pehī'ti vutto, viddho samāno codito sārathinā pacchā laṅghati, kubbaraṃ hanati, tidaṇḍaṃ bhañjati. evarūpo'pi, bhikkhave, idh'ekacco assakhaḷuṅko hoti. ayaṃ, bhikkhave, dutiyo assadoso.

Example1:
padumaṃ yathā kokanadaṃ sugandhaṃ,

tapantam'ādiccam'iv'antalikkhe'ti.

Meaning IN CONTEXT: before; previously; formerly; in the past
Example1: tassa evaṃ hoti, mayaṃ kho pubbe agāriyabhūtā samānā aññe ovadāma'pi anusāsāma'pi. ime pan'amhākaṃ puttamattā maññe nattamattā maññe ovaditabbaṃ anusāsitabbaṃ maññantī'ti.

Example1: kammadhārayasaññe ca samāse itthiyaṃ tuly'ādhikaraṇe pade pubbe bhāsitapum'itthī ce, pumā'va daṭṭhabbā. brāhmaṇadārikā, khattiyakaññā, khattiyakumārikā.

Example1:

Meaning IN CONTEXT: in the evening; at night; late at night
Example1: tassa mayhaṃ, bhikkhu, rañño sato khattiyassa muddh'āvasittassa caturāsītithālipākasahassāni ahesuṃ, sāyaṃ pātaṃ bhatt'ābhihāro abhihariyittha.
